listings.Description of job/activites: The Commercial Operations Intern will focus on improving operational efficiency through account cleanup, dashboard creation, and supporting simplification projects. Responsibilities include assisting in maintaining customer accounts, managing dashboards, tracking KPIs, collaborating on process simplifications, and supporting operational performance indicators.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Fresh graduate or currently pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or related field; Strong analytical skills; Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite; Excellent communication skills in English; Highly organized; Strong teamwork skills.
